name: Rhythm is 20/20
description:
When's the last time you had your eyes checked?

Rhythm is 20/20 is an optometry-themed rhythm game. Sit back and try to relax as you time beats to your optometrist's favorite tunes.

Track List:
  1. How Dare I
  2. Tumultuous Time
  3. Sigh Smoothly
  4. Failure

Programming and Art by Indiana Kuffer
Music by Janno Tavas

Made for the GameMaker 20 Jam
